title: The Castaway Pines
description: In The Castaway Pines, Momma and Poppa Pine try to frustrate a logger because they think he wants to make them into Presto logs. When they find out that he wants them for Christmas trees, they begin to think differently. The Castaway Pines is written as a stage play, which introduces readers to a new genre.
meta: bough, castaway, defenseless, distracted, evergreen, frustrated, harvest, limbs, nutrients
Use the reading strategy of retelling
Author's Purpose : Understand and identify author's purpose
Plural Endings : Identify and form plural nouns
